Retrieve demo data to share with customer to make test for each pluginÂ¶

Retrieve these demo data to permit the customer to test the plugin into a demo store:

Retrieve Magento fronted and backend url for Magento1 and Magento2 Set a backend admin account with restricted permissions to check only these configurations: Payment methods configuration Order grid and order details Show frontend and backend access data into plugin documentation and also explain how to find these data into plugin product page
